description.value:
The Lord of the Hunt is the master of predators and marauding raiders. One of the Agonies, Vorunar was initially the hunt-master of Melion.

Edicts: Delight in the hunt, wait to strike until you have the advantage, protect the wilds.

Anathema: Break an oath of protection, abuse dogs or other animals, refuse to let prey which outsmarts you escape.

Areas of Concern: Hunting, the wilderness, dogs.
